name: fish-pish-extension
description: Premium Phishing Detection with Gamified Awareness

scripts.build: npx tailwindcss -i ./src/style.css -o ./content.css && esbuild src/content.tsx --bundle --outfile=content.js --minify --loader:.tsx=tsx --jsx=automatic && esbuild src/background.ts --bundle --outfile=background.js --minify
